name: Official TSR® Games GiantLands® Animated Illustration
description: GiantLands® is a new table-top role playing game and theme park from the team that brought you the original Dungeons & Dragons, including Gary Gygax Jr, Larry Elmore and James Ward! Our first official NFT, showing four unique character species you can play! This is an original drawing hand drawn and inked by legendary fantasy artist Jeff Dee, colorized by Steve Ince @Steve_Ince, animated & minted by Stephen E. Dinehart @Sedart4. This limited edition of 250 will never be minted again!
